get_ports.description: Returns a `list` of Port objects for services running on the computer.

File.description: Obtain a `File` object for a file on the machine. Returns a File object or `null` if the file does not exist.

create_folder.description: Creates a directory name within path. Returns `1` (true) on success or `0` (false) / `null` on failure.

is_network_active.description: Does the Computer have internet access?. Returns `1` (true) or `0` (false).

touch.description: Creates an empty file with the name of filename (`string`) in the chosen directory path (`string`). Returns `1` on success, or a `string` (containing an error) on failure.

show_procs.description: Returns a `string` listing the processes currently running on the machine.

network_devices.description: Returns a `string` with a list of network device(s) on the computer.

change_password.description: Changes an existing user's password. Takes a user (`string`) and password (`string`). Returns `1` on success, or error `string` on failure.

create_user.description: Creates a new user on the computer. Requires a username (`string`) and password (`string`). Returns `1` on success, or error `string` on failure.

delete_user.description: Deletes a user, and optionally deletes their /home/user directory. Requires username (`string`) and takes an optional removeHome `int` (`1` or `0`). Returns `1` on success, or error `string` on failure.

create_group.description: Creates a group (named with a chosen `string`) for the named user (`string` username of an existing user account). Returns `1` (true) on success or error `string` on failure.

delete_group.description: Deletes a group (named `string`) on the machine, removing it from the named user (`string` username of an existing user). Returns `1` (true) on success or error `string` on failure.

groups.description: Returns a line delimited string of all groups a given user (`string` username) belongs to.

close_program.description: Terminates a process. Takes a process ID (`int`). Returns `1` on success, `0` if the process cannot be found, or an error `string` on failure to terminate the process.

wifi_networks.description: Takes a network interface (`string` e.g. eth0). Returns a list object of WiFi networks available to the user's machine.

connect_wifi.description: Connects to a wireless network. Takes an interface (`string` e.g. eth0), bssid (`string`), essid (`string`), and password (`string`). Returns `1` on successful connection, `null` if the network cannot be found, or an error `string` on connection failure.
